column1: If you haven't already NOW is the time to go VOTE for the conservative outsider ready to redeploy to Congress.   Polls close at 7pm and if you're in line before then you can still vote!   #KS02 #ksleg

Just cast my ballot 🗳 and I'd encourage you to do the same! This race is about a lifetime of service versus a lifetime of selfservice.  I am the conservative outsider who will never stop fighting for you and I am ready to redeploy!   #ksleg #ks02 https://t.co/UEMT7C0zhp

Thanks to the Topeka 9/12 for inviting me to speak on this election day eve.   They know I'm the conservative outsider who will always have their six. I am honored to have your vote tomorrow.  #ksleg #ks02 https://t.co/W4yBRoj4zM

In Lawrence knocking doors.   At all my stops one thing is clear: Kansans are desperate for a release from career politicians raising their taxes stealing their land and lying about the truth.   They’re ready for outsiders and Trump & I will deliver this November!  #ksleg #ks02 https://t.co/hhF73xYZII

Spent the afternoon in Valley Falls meeting voters throughout the community! The @NFIB endorsed me because they know I am the best candidate in the #KS02 race to help our small businesses recover.   #ksleg https://t.co/4mUtHHbZzs
Quick stop at Old Eagle Mercantile in Lecompton on the way out of town. Great to see so many energized Republicans ready to re-elect a political outsider!   #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/kwnvLqk4oH
An INCREDIBLE night  Thanks to @TreyTaylorMusic for coming out to #TopCity to support my campaign.  #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/na433Umnwa

Second stop today was at the Territorial Capitol Museum in historic Lecompton. It was my pleasure to speak to precinct committee leaders about how I am the only nationally endorsed pro-life candidate in the race.  #ksleg #ks02 https://t.co/rZvgS0WQ7K
Great start to the morning at Jefferson County GOP's Eggs & Issues. I stand for Trump. I stand for Republican Unity. I am ready to re-depoly.  #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/TgzOuOfKPk
Join @TreyTaylorMusic and I for a concert in Topeka this upcoming Friday!  Get your tickets here while they last!  https://t.co/PZqIEuhKVq  #KS02 #ksleg
Watkins Warriors were out in Paola yesterday walking in the Miami County Parade.   I am humbled to have your support!  #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/QqAYJi3uSj

Great to see so many familiar faces at the Osage County GOP Candidate Forum & Potluck!   I am the conservative outsider you can trust to fight along side @realDonaldTrump   #ksleg #ks02 https://t.co/I7a0zzmkbY
Great end of the day seeing so many 2nd district athletes at the Annual #ShrineBowl   #ksleg #ks02 https://t.co/UtonXrZqpo

Had a blast with volunteers at the Topeka Gun Show today! Got to talk to people from all over the district about my @NRA endorsement and work as Trump campaign co-chair!  #ksleg #ks02 https://t.co/BONDh3mqae
Watkins Warriors out at Erie walking in the parade!  #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/QLrIzICMrY
I was happy to meet with @KansasTARS today to talk about my re-election campaign  and the future of our country. The whole crew is ready to #MAGA  #ksleg #ks02 https://t.co/nG8bbbtbIg
Great start to the day in Yates Center!  I am the pro-gun pro-life pro-Trump conservative outsider who will never stop fighting for you.   #ksleg #ks02 https://t.co/1wT2P9qtka

All of the coincidences surrounding this blatant political witch hunt point to one inevitable conclusion: LaTurner colluded with a corrupt prosecutor to win an election he’s losing by more than 20 points. Kansans deserve answers.

Payoffs. Collusion. Corruption. With each passing day Jake LaTurner’s story changes & more questions go unanswered about his ties to the corrupt Shawnee County DA. #ks02 #ksleg https://t.co/cV6Fo9abRL

Great end to the day in Anderson county at their GOP forum.   While the career politician hides behind his swamp tactics I am proud to be out on the trail talking with grassroots voters.   #ks02 #ksleg https://t.co/8XIPN23EWR

Last stop of the day is in Atchison for a meet and greet. Thank you to all the supporters for showing up in force.   #KS02 needs a war fighter not a ladder climber. Thank you for having my 6.  #ksleg https://t.co/nhIObLEnq3

Great turnout in Muscotah for the grand reopening of the Muscotah Cafe. Also got to see the world's biggest baseball!   All of these folks are ready to see @realDonaldTrump and me back in office come November!  #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/352fIREiCa

Second stop of the day was in Everest talking to community leaders and business owners about my campaign my work as co-chair of @realDonaldTrump re-election and my endorsement from the @NRA  #ksleg #KS02 https://t.co/aBvWkotxzh

First stop in Seneca this morning.   Kansans are sick and tired of career politicians and their swamp tactics and hit jobs. Folks are excited to send a fighter and outsider to DC.   #ksleg #ks02 https://t.co/AG6lZnJKeP
https://t.co/JqA2QE1oDE

Tune in tonight at 6:30pm for a live-televised debate to learn more about my conservative pro-Trump record endorsed by @NRA @NRLC @kansansforlife & @NFIB  📺 @KSNTNews 💻 https://t.co/TqL2GmNLXg 📱 @Steve4Kansas  #KS02 #ksleg
Watkins Warriors were out knocking doors and delivering signs yesterday.   Momentum continues to grow!   #ksleg #ks02 #WinWithWatkins https://t.co/j4We59Jj3W

Met with the Franklin County GOP last night to talk about my 96% voting record with @realdonaldtrump and work as Honorary Chairman to the Kansas @TeamTrump re-election campaign.  #ksleg #ks02 https://t.co/cGL8sTWfK3

Watkins Warriors were knocking doors in Osage City and walking in the Osage County Fair Parade today!   These Warriors are working like we are 26 points behind!   #ksleg #ks02 #WinWithWatkins https://t.co/GlcT0dPDm3

Montgomery county forum tonight.   Talking about a life of service versus a life of selfservice. I've spent my life fighting for our country - and I'm ready to redeploy to Washington.   #ksleg #ks02 https://t.co/DojVqUjLVI

Second stop of the day in Pittsburg at El Charro discussing my endorsements from @NFIB and award from @USChamber for my dedication towards small businesses.   I always love interacting with our #SEKS community leaders and businesses that make our state thrive.   #ksleg #ks02 https://t.co/sWZqH7KZ01

First stop of the day at the Nu Grill in Ft. Scott.   Great talking to leaders of Bourbon County about my recent @NRA endorsement and my work as co-chair of @realDonaldTrump re-election campaign in KS!   #ksleg #ks02 https://t.co/1PeYb4mzgJ
New 4x8s are in and #WatkinsWarriors are on the move!   Get a sign: https://t.co/rPtNJzNxG7  Volunteer: https://t.co/QjCq95qSgs  #KS02 #ksleg #WinWithWatkins https://t.co/JYOmkpLM98

My friend @DanCrenshawTX has a new book "Fortitude: American Resilience in the Era of Outrage." A great read about Dan's service to our country as a Navy SEAL & Congressman. He's signing 50 copies of his new book for my top supporters -- get yours now ⬇️ https://t.co/pX7mEc9IYs https://t.co/7TP8XXXs7H

Another stop on the trail in Douglas county talking about the need for a conservative warrior in Congress who will stand with @realDonaldTrump   Thanks again for having me!  #ks02 #ksleg https://t.co/LToJycpZiM

Last night in Leavenworth I loved listening to what you want in your Congressman: a conservative outsider that fights for you.   I'm battle tested and endorsed by the @NRA @nrlc @kansansforlife & @NFIB.   #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/t1wyVB4LvE
Great speaking with Topeka's 9/12 about the conservative values I'm fighting for in Washington.   I'm ready to redeploy.   Learn more: https://t.co/Mn00zmjGvt  #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/B6gyi2Y3KP

God Bless America! Great parade in Woodson County!  #ksleg #ks02 https://t.co/ylNst6ETpG

🚨 I've been endorsed by the @NFIB!   As our nation recovers from COVID-19 I will continue standing w/ President @realDonaldTrump to deliver his America-first agenda that will support Kansas business owners & ensure we rebuild our economy stronger than ever before. #ks02 #ksleg https://t.co/8FAjFrc6RF
Highway signs going up along 69!   Sign up to become a Watkins Warrior 👉 https://t.co/fQGSGLZc9p  #ksleg #ks02 #WinWithWatkins https://t.co/gBtoiPIi69

Our re-election campaign has now been endorsed by National Right to Life (@nrlc) @kansansforlife the @NRA & the Guardian Fund. Kansans can rest assured I will always defend our shared conservative values. #ks02 #ksleg https://t.co/gGYwyP7ghF

🚨 @NRA HAS ENDORSED MY RE-ELECTION IN #KS02!   As the only candidate in this race w/ the endorsement of the NRA Kansans can rest assured I will always stand w/ President @realDonaldTrump to preserve our right to self-defense and our Constitutional freedoms at all costs. #ksleg https://t.co/Jq0xZSu6bw
Had a great time at the Leavenworth County GOP annual picnic! Over 20 great republican candidates here to help kansas #RemainRed and re-elect @realDonaldTrump   #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/bXKDN7m1VP

We must keep the 2nd District in Republican hands & make sure we help President @realDonaldTrump  turn Kansas RED in November. As Co-Chair of the President's re-election campaign -- I will get the job done.

🚨🚨 OUR FIRST TV AD LAUNCHED TODAY!  2 years ago you sent me to Congress to fight alongside President @realDonaldTrump protect conservative values & defend our Constitution. I'm proud of the victories we've delivered for Kansans - but my mission is not over yet. #ks02 #ksleg https://t.co/VGa2bamXYj

Leavenworth Republican Women are ready to re-elect @realdonaldtrump!   Thanks for inviting me to give an update on my campaign and recent endorsements from @nrlc & @kansansforlife; and my work as co-chair of the Trump 2020 Kansas re-election team!   #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/FxuDbjUqkI
I’m honored to be the only candidate in #KS02 with the endorsement of both @kansansforlife & the @nrlc.  Read my full release here ⬇️ https://t.co/klFuwdM6sU https://t.co/rSamJpphfh

🚨 I've been endorsed by @kansansforlife!  Whether it’s fighting to defund Planned Parenthood or introducing legislation like the ‘Pro-LIFE’ Act Kansans can trust me to stand w/ President @realDonaldTrump & lead the fight in Congress to defend the sanctity of life. #ksleg #ks02 https://t.co/yNJvHGdMqH

Honored to be among the 12 veterans @MavPAC is supporting this cycle. These young professionals are the future of the conservative movement & I look forward to working with them to Take Back the House this November! Keep up the good work!   #ksleg #ks02   https://t.co/WtUDojxSiH
Happy Birthday @VP @Mike_Pence!   #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/ZPXlzMcnWt

I fought in Iraq & Afghanistan and now I'm fighting for President Trump. I vote with him 96% of the time and he's made me honorary chairman of his Kansas re-election campaign. I'd like for folks to redeploy me to Capitol Hill so I can continue to fight for them.  #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/typx40Dhsn

Absolutely shameful that Gov. Kelly chose to rescue a fellow tax-supporting career politician instead of rescuing Kansans who are struggling to make ends meet. This repeal was supported by nearly everyone in the State House & Senate too.

Gov. Kelly just rescued Jake "Lying" LaTurner. She vetoed the repeal of LaTurner's 2015 amendment that paved the way for the largest tax increase in state history & resulted in yearly property tax hikes for Kansans. #ks02 #ksleg  FULL RELEASE: https://t.co/ANKpGIesKO

Appreciate Topeka’s 9-12 Group for the invitation last night to discuss my re-election campaign and the recent endorsement I received from @nrlc. Thanks for having my six.  I'm ready to redeploy!  #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/oBSgc3csNS

🚨 I'm honored to have earned the endorsement of the Guardian Fund. They know the importance of keeping conservative battle-tested military vets in Congress to help President @realDonaldTrump deliver results for Kansans & the American people. I won't let them down. #ks02 #ksleg https://t.co/DHMRdGDLtS

While Democrats in Congress work overtime to expand access to abortion and use taxpayer money to fund radical organizations like Planned Parenthood Kansans can rest assured that I will always stand up for life our pro-life values and the most vulnerable of our society.

🚨🚨🚨 I'm honored to have once again earned the endorsement of the @nrlc the nation’s oldest and largest organization committed to defending the sanctity of life and the rights of the unborn. #ks02 #ksleg https://t.co/v1j6XVSS6g

I would like to congratulate @KansasTARS for starting their operations this week!   They are the newest chapter of the @KansasGOP for the Republican youth of today and Republican leaders of tomorrow.   Looking forward to working together for many years to come!  #ksleg #KS02 https://t.co/hMVxgUvLcJ

Kansans know what’s at stake this election which is why they are rallying behind my re-election campaign to make sure we keep a battle-tested conservative & trusted ally of our President in Congress to secure our borders protect life & stop socialist Dems from destroying our 2A

To win these battles Kansans know we must unify behind a candidate who like President Trump himself is an outsider not a career politician – one with solid conservative values and battle-tested leadership who can help return America to greatness and I am ready to re-deploy.

🚨 I officially filed for re-election!  It's been the honor of a lifetime serving the hard-working men & women of #ks02 but the fight to protect President @realDonaldTrump's agenda & our conservative values is not over; our freedoms constitution & country are at stake. #ksleg https://t.co/pp04yrTrWd
As Honorary @TeamTrump KS Chair it was great to address the patriots from @Great2ndKSGOP   Looking forward to re-electing @realDonaldTrump   #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/J0bsA8Pv7E

. @MikeGarcia2020 Looking forward to having another vet in Congress! This is great news for freedom loving patriots everywhere and a sign of what’s to come in November! #Trump2020 #MAGA   #ksleg #ks02 https://t.co/Yi0wSHPTmF

Great talking to @Great2ndKSGOP about the latest on COVID-19 and my work as @realDonaldTrump’s Kansas Campaign Co-Chair.   Thanks for all your work advancing our conservative causes! Looking forward to working together for many years to come!   #ksleg #KS02 #MAGA #KAG https://t.co/xQzef027HD
Thanks to the leaders of @MavPAC for inviting me to speak to their membership today. Great questions & engagement. Looking forward to working together!   #ksleg #KS02 #MavPAC https://t.co/JJ6Nx3oE86

.@HumboldtSpdwy’s Pack the Track volunteering as well as driving several laps on the track!   Great to see so many familiar faces having fun practicing social distancing and supporting small and local business!   #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/j9YTQOiIWy

I hope everyone enjoys a happy and blessed Easter Sunday.   He is Risen!  #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/0n1k0NF0q1

Back in Yates Center to provide a federal legislative update to the Woodson County Farm Bureau.   As a member of Whip Scalise’s USMCA Whip Team seeing this vital trade deal implemented has been one of my top priorities.   #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/a2ONQhCh8Q

Great to be back in Holton speaking with the Jackson County GOP about  my work as an honorary chairman of @realdonaldtrump’s re-election campaign in Kansas.  2020 is our year to take back the house and deliver a majority for the President.   #KS02 #ksleg https://t.co/3SO6L7NVQT

Huge news: a recent poll has me leading my opponent by 26 points! I will always stand @realDonaldTrump & as his Kansas Campaign co-Chair I will continue delivering conservative victories in Washington for Kansans.  #ks02 #ksleg  Check it out ⬇️   https://t.co/9YFzLQes6Y

Happy #PresidentsDay @realDonaldTrump. Together as political freshmen & outsiders we delivered #KS02 in 2018 and with Republican Unity will again in 2020!   #PromisesMadePromisesKept   #ksleg https://t.co/bhwPbDNtVV
